name: Brang
description:
GO FULLSCREEN

Brang!

Because it sounds cool!

Because Boomerang was horrendously time consuming when used in code.

Because austalians scare me.

It's super simly. Imagine you are playing the pool. But you are small, and you have australian frisbee instead of cue. And there are some questionable people ruining your fun.

Consider giving some feedback.

https://www.buymeacoffee.com/KhrisDev
